categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This female individual was in the Canto Bight casino in 34 ABY. Her companion, known as the Master Codebreaker, referred to her simply as "Lovey." As the pair maintained a high level of secrecy, they refused to disclose their real names. "Lovey" was also carefully studying the Master Codebreaker in the hopes of usurping his title.
"Lovey" first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, the second installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. She was portrayed by UK model Lily Cole.
